Rapid City.First Congregational Church (Rapid City,:
TheFirst Congregational Church in Rapid City, South Dakota, also known as The Lord's Chapel, is a historic church at 715 Kansas City Street. It was built in 1914 and was added to the National Register in 1984.
It is a two-story masonry and brick building which is about 55 by 73 feet (17 m × 22 m) in plan.
